Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the appointment of a lieutenant-governor and the line of succession; repealer
Summary: Relates to the appointment of a lieutenant-governor and the line of succession; creates the committee on gubernatorial disability.
LawCode: Amd §43, add §§44 & 45, Pub Off L; rpld Art 1-A, Chap 343 of 1959
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the appointment of a lieutenant-governor and the line of succession and establishes the committee on gubernatorial disability; and to repeal article 1-A of the New York state defense emergency act of 1951 relating thereto
